caption.p: Total band patterns across populations of H. cordata. no. Bands, number of different bands; No. Bands Freq. >=5%, number of different bands with a frequency ≥ 5%; no. Private Bands, number of bands unique to a single population; no. LComm Bands (<=25%), number of locally common bands (Freq. ≥ 5%) found in 25% or fewer populations; no. LComm Bands (<=50%), number of locally common bands (Freq. ≥ 50%) found in 50% or fewer populations; He, expected gene diversity; uHe, unbiased expected gene diversity. Full name of the populations is given in Table 1
